allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Configure Next.js for Cloudflare Pages deployment

Changes:
- Enable static export mode \(output: ''export''\)
- Disable image optimization for Cloudflare compatibility
- Add trailing slash for proper routing
- Fix TypeScript error in csv-viewer component
- Add comprehensive Cloudflare deployment guide

Build output verified:
- Static HTML files generated in out/ directory
- All routes properly exported \(/, /about, /viewer\)
- Ready for Cloudflare Pages deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
